title: beefs-rngs
blurb: A suite of high-integrity RNGs, TRNG interfaces, and Bitcoin-derived randomness with batteries for Dieharder, TestU01, and PractRand.
description: beefs-rngs provides deterministic PRNGs and pluggable TRNG backends under a unified API. Includes ChaCha20-DRBG streams, SHAKE-based expanders, and entropy adapters for hardware RNGs and Bitcoin-header VRF-style derivations. Ships with reproducible test harnesses that run Dieharder, TestU01, and PractRand at scale, producing HTML reports and JSON summaries for CI.
